body_html:
@shuangwu @kinDSa @patoalejor
It's not finding the Java files under tensorflow/java. Looks like this was missed on the recent conversion of TensorFlowInferenceInterface to use the Java API. If you add "../../java/src/main" to java.srcDirs in build.gradle that should do the trick. I'll send a PR to fix this.

@htyspghtz We're working on full Gradle/cmake/makefile support that will let Android Studio build on Windows. Should be out in the next week or two :)
